text: More power to ya Gaston! Starting on v1.5 would be awesome, and if there are and additions/improvements you'd like to make to v2, that would be a good thing to work on also. I'd say it's up to you.
The current rig: is it the ideal outer dimensions?
Would people rather something smaller or bigger on any side?
it's basically the maximum size of jeep portability
well the next version will be able to be broken down for transport and put back together quickly
so we have a little more flexibility on assembled size
Is a new version of the 80/20 rig being currently worked on?
yes, but so far only sketches
the idea was for me to do a new 8020 rig and josh to work on the new box
TBH though this wasn't a task I got from a producer...
hah! ok. At minimum I'm just playing around with ideas until my other projects get unblocked
